title: Matrixport Says SEC Will Reject All Spot Bitcoin ETF Proposals
description: Markus Thielen, analyst at Matrixport, has predicted that the United States Securities and Exchange Commission will reject all spot Bitcoin ETF applications this month.

title: dYdX exchange reveals post-mortem results of $9m November attack
description: Decentralized exchange dYdX has released a comprehensive report analyzing the “targeted attack” it encountered on its v3 platform in November. The incident led to a substantial loss of $9 million from its insurance fund, a figure that constitutes about 40%…

title: Pushd aims to revamp online trading; could overtake BNB and Tron
description: While BNB and Tron have posted strong gains, Pushd might outperform them in 2024

title: Bitcoin ETFs on the horizon: SEC meetings point to potential listings on major exchanges
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) may begin notifying the public of results of the spot Bitcoin (BTC) ETFs shortly. According to a Jan. 3 report in Fox Business, sources familiar with the matter say the first announcement of…

title: Ripple (XRP) Dethroned by Solana (SOL); Investor Excitement Surrounds Rebel Satoshi (RBLZ)
description: In the dynamic realm of cryptocurrencies, Solana (SOL) has recently outshone Ripple (XRP), a long-time favorite in the crypto market. title: Crypto Exchange Trading Volume Hits $1.1 Trillion in December 2023
description:
The global cryptocurrency market witnessed a significant milestone in December 2023. The data shows that the monthly trading volume surged past the $1 trillion mark for the first time since September 2022.  The Block data spans from January 2023 to January 2024 and includes major cryptocurrency exchanges such as Binance, UPbit, OKX, Huobi, Coinbase, and […]

title: Bitcoin on the Cusp of a Pullback? Analyst Kevin Svenson Says BTC Could See ‘Ugly Liquidations’ if This Happens
description:

Svenson tells his 71,200 YouTube subscribers in a new video that Bitcoin is in overbought territory on the weekly chart based on the Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicator. The RSI measures the price momentum […]
